dateRelativeDay.description: A relative day with a detailed date (e.g., 'Today - Wednesday 15 January 2025').

dateTimeOfDay.description: The time of day in 24-hour format (e.g., '11:01').

domain.description: The domain name of the URL (e.g., 'localhost:8000').

fallbackFaviconText.description: A single uppercase letter used as favicon text.

url.description: A complete URL including query parameters.
